name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】遂に復帰‼重大告知ライブ【#星街すいせい重大告知】 [CPUYPXa7D7s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: MC section transition to the next song.

subtitles.original: 高速じゃ足りない
subtitles.english: High speed isn't enough

subtitles.original: もうすぐ迫ってるランデブー
subtitles.english: The rendezvous is fast approaching

subtitles.original: フルスロットル向かってる　月が満ちるまで
subtitles.english: Heading at full throttle until the moon is full

subtitles.original: 時間はもうない
subtitles.english: There's no more time

subtitles.original: まだ君を待ってる　勝ってる　なんか歌っては笑ってる
subtitles.english: I'm still waiting for you, winning, singing and laughing

subtitles.original: 余裕なんてないくせにさ
subtitles.english: Even though I have no room to spare

subtitles.original: 高速じゃ足りない　足りない　君とじゃ足りない　足りない
subtitles.english: High speed isn't enough, not enough, with you it's not enough, not enough

subtitles.original: 逃げ切るよ明日　明日　君に見せたいから
subtitles.english: I'll make it through tomorrow, tomorrow, because I want to show you

subtitles.original: 夜はまだ明けない　明けない　夢はまだ覚めない　覚めない
subtitles.english: The night won't end yet, won't end, the dream won't break yet, won't break

subtitles.original: さあ今前へ
subtitles.english: Now, move forward

subtitles.original: 凹凸のハイウェイ　飛ばして　大きめの一歩で once again
subtitles.english: Speeding down the bumpy highway, taking a big step once again

subtitles.original: 月が満ちるまで　あと百十五秒
subtitles.english: Until the moon is full, another 115 seconds

subtitles.original: 今フルスロットル向かってる　下向かないように走ってる
subtitles.english: Heading at full throttle now, running so I don't look down

subtitles.original: 悩んでる暇はない
subtitles.english: There's no time to worry

subtitles.original: 高速でめぐり　めぐり　今度こそ make it make it
subtitles.english: Going round and round at high speed, this time I'll make it, make it

subtitles.original: 逃げ出そう今夜　今夜　君をさらってから
subtitles.english: Let's escape tonight, tonight, after I take you away

subtitles.original: 夜はまだ明けない　明けない　夢はまだ覚めない　覚めない
subtitles.english: The night won't end yet, won't end, the dream won't break yet, won't break

subtitles.original: さあ今前へ
subtitles.english: Now, move forward

subtitles.original: 空を駆けて
subtitles.english: Run through the sky

subtitles.original: 高速じゃ足りない
subtitles.english: High speed isn't enough

subtitles.original: 未来の世界へ
subtitles.english: To the future world

subtitles.original: 高速じゃ足りない　足りない　到着でもう一回
subtitles.english: High speed isn't enough, it's not enough, one more time upon arrival

subtitles.original: 追いついた今日は　今日は　君と見ていたいから
subtitles.english: I finally caught up today, today, because I want to see it with you

subtitles.original: 夜はまだ明けない　明けない　夢はまだ覚めない　覚めない
subtitles.english: The night won't end yet, won't end, the dream won't break yet, won't break

subtitles.original: さあ今前へ
subtitles.english: Now, move forward

subtitles.original: 時を越えて
subtitles.english: Across time

subtitles.original: 時を越えて
subtitles.english: Across time

subtitles.original: それでは、次の曲聞いてください、コメットメドレー！
subtitles.english: And now, please listen to the next song, Comet Medley!

subtitles.original: あの空で輝いた　流れ星を追いかけて
subtitles.english: Chasing the shooting star that shone in that sky

subtitles.original: いつか君を照らすから　彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Because I'll shine on you someday, comet starlight

subtitles.original: 生まれたばかりの小さな光は
subtitles.english: The small light that has just been born

subtitles.original: 消えてしまいそうな声で　歌を歌ったんだ
subtitles.english: Sang a song with a voice that seemed about to vanish

subtitles.original: 誰かに届くようにと　その声を振り絞って
subtitles.english: Squeezing out that voice so it would reach someone

subtitles.original: 今はまだ響かないけど　いつかその心に
subtitles.english: It doesn't resonate yet, but someday in that heart

subtitles.original: 満天の星を降らせよう　眩いほど煌めくよ
subtitles.english: Let's make a sky full of stars rain down, they'll sparkle so brightly

subtitles.original: 何もかも忘れるくらい　とびきりのステージをあげる
subtitles.english: I'll give you an extraordinary stage, enough to make you forget everything

subtitles.original: 今夜は眠れないほどに　胸を躍らせて
subtitles.english: Make your heart dance so much you can't sleep tonight

subtitles.original: 手を取って　さあ行こう　彗星のスターライト
subtitles.english: Take my hand, let's go, comet starlight
